Name: QuiVr Vanguard
About the game: QuiVr Vanguard gives you a bite sized fantasy archery experience built from the ground up for VR. A map loved by many of the VR Early Adopters, bow mechanics fine tuned over years of development, and an ever expanding pool of items and enemies make QuiVr Vanguard a fantastic intro to VR or a fun way to kill some time. Features Best in class bow and arrow physics, battle tested in QuiVr Drop-in/Drop-out multiplayer Global, weekly leaderboards Multiple environment skins Varied subset of enemies found in QuiVr Random item rewards as you play
Meta Title: QuiVr Vanguard: Nov 19, 2018, Blueteak and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on QuiVr Vanguard? Check out the release date (Nov 19, 2018), developer insights from Blueteak, and a complete game summary.
